title: Exploring innovative TCM aromatherapy in China's Jiangxi | There's a long history of using aromatic herbs in Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM) aromatherapy. Follow Pakistani student Fahad Kabeer to find out how... | By China Xinhua News | Facebook
